meteringCharges.description: Charges may vary, please contact us on 131 806 for specific metering charges.

fees.description: Connection fee (GST incl) for standard move in requests during business hours. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.
Disconnection fee (GST incl) generally applies for any move-out request. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.

electricityContract.terms: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Ausgrid distribution zone with applicable network tariff. Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. All times are AEST, unless you have an interval meter, in which case daylight savings time will apply.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Customer Charter and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business day prior to the variation.

incentives.description: Red will contribute $5 to Rotary International District 9815 Incorporated (ABN 11 298 508 921) for each calendar month you are on the Red Rotary D9815 Saver electricity plan, starting from the date we become responsible for your electricity supply.

demandCharges.description: Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 2pm to 8pm Mon to Fri (incl public holidays). Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between the relevant dates from 2pm to 8pm Mon to Fri (incl public holidays). Applies per day on the maximum KW demand for all usage.

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: SOLAR 1 Red Energy FIT - GST included if any (FiT availability based on current network tariff configuration)
SOLAR 2 Surplus FiT (First 6.85 kWh/day) - GST included if any: 10am to 3pm Monday to Sunday (FiT availability based on current network tariff configuration)
SOLAR 2 Surplus FiT (Balance) - GST included if any: 10am to 3pm Monday to Sunday (FiT availability based on current network tariff configuration)
SOLAR 2 Smart FiT - GST included if any: 4pm to 9pm Monday to Sunday (FiT availability based on current network tariff configuration)
SOLAR 2 Solar FiT - GST included if any: All other times (FiT availability based on current network tariff configuration)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: The fees and charges listed in the Fees and Charges section above apply to the standard move in and move out requests. For details on our additional fees and charges, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/additional-service-charges-nsw or contact us on 131 806.
